name: Explore North & Mid Wales Pass (4 in 8 days)
description:
EXPLORE NORTH & MID WALES PASS Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for any 4 days in 8 days. 
 
      It covers the whole of north Wales and extends as far south as Aberystwyth and Shrewsbury and eastwards to Chester and Crewe. Buy this ticket online from the TfW website It is also valid on Traws Cymru bus services. 
      Bus travel and other discounted facilities are available on any day in the chosen period, even if that day is not selected for rail travel. A discount of 20% is offered by the Ffestiniog Railway. Other heritage railways may offer discounts: Fairbourne Railway; Llanberis Lake Railway and Talyllyn Railway, 
      contact them for details. You can visit seven of the Welsh narrow gauge railways: the Vale of Rheidol at Aberystwyth, the Talyllyn at Tywyn, the Fairbourne by the Mawddach estuary, the Welshpool & Llanfair 
      at Welshpool and the Ffestiniog, Welsh Highland and Welsh Highland Heritage railways at Porthmadog.
